snippet: A Zumba fitness instructor at the center of a prostitution scandal told a judge who sentenced her Friday to 10 months in jail that she is happy to have escaped her former life.
abstract: Alexis Wright, Zumba fitness instructor at center of prostitution scandal in Maine, is sentenced to 10 months in jail.
lead_paragraph: A Zumba fitness instructor at the center of a prostitution scandal told a judge who sentenced her Friday to 10 months in jail that she is happy to have escaped her former life.

headline.main: Maine: Zumba Teacher Sentenced for Prostitution
headline.print_headline: Maine: Zumba Teacher Sentenced For Prostitution
